# Clay

generate laterite clay
host
hardness 0.6
texture strata:blocks/clay/laterite
vanillaItem minecraft:clay

# Ground

generate peat ground
host
hardness 0.5
texture strata:blocks/ground/peat

# Weak

generate breccia stone
host
hardness 1.0
texture strata:blocks/stone/weak/breccia

generate breccia cobble
hardness 1.5
texture strata:overlays/cobble normal 86 strata:blocks/stone/weak/breccia

hardness 1.0
texture strata:overlays/brick_highlight lighten 21 strata:overlays/brick_shadow darken 30 strata:blocks/stone/weak/breccia
